snippet: Queens Park Rangers Manager Harry Redknapp had to be content with a point in his first game against his former club, lifting the struggling team off the bottom of the standings.
abstract: Chelsea beats Stoke, 4-0, in England’s Premier League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Queens Park Rangers Manager Harry Redknapp had to be content with a point in his first game against his former club, lifting the struggling team off the bottom of the standings.

headline.seo: In England, Chelsea Moves Into Third Place
headline.main: Chelsea Vaults Over Tottenham Into Third
